alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Echols, southwestern Brantley, central Ware, Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Manor to 6 miles east of Mayday. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Argyle, Stephen Foster State Park, Mayday, Needmore, Manor, Race Pond and Winokur. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
